headline: Evercore starts Visa, Mastercard, PayPal at In Line rating amid macro risks
summary: Investing.com --Evercore ISI initiated coverage on Visa Inc (NYSE:V), Mastercard Inc (NYSE:MA), and PayPal Holdings Inc (NASDAQ:PYPL) with In Line ratings, viewing the payments leaders as defensive plays in a volatile macro environment but noting valuation sensitivities and execution risks.Evercore sees Visa as a defensive stalwart, Mastercard is preferred on valuation while PayPal’s turnaround depends on execution.

headline: PayPal price target lowered to $90 from $120 at Monness Crespi
summary: Monness Crespi analyst Gus Gala lowered the firm’s price target on PayPal (PYPL) to $90 from $120 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. PayPal is already trading at “sub-bottom quartile of historical merchant acquirer takeouts,” says the analyst, who would remain a buyer here and be buying as shares come down. headline: PayPal Holdings, Inc. (PYPL) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
summary: Paypal (PYPL) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.

headline: Trump Stock Market Crash: 3 Surefire Stocks That Are Too Cheap to Pass Up
summary: A tariff-induced tumble for the Dow, S&P 500, and Nasdaq Composite paves the way for opportunistic investors to buy shares of phenomenal businesses at a discount.
